text: Sir Peter Mason KBE was Chairman of Thames Water and senior non-executive director of BAE Systems plc. He was previously Chief Executive of AMEC. He has also held senior positions at Balfour Beatty, BICC and Norwest Holst. ==References== Category:BAE Systems people Category:Thames Water Category:Living people Category:British businesspeople Category:Knights Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
